text: Joseph L. Goldstein (born April 18, 1940) is a biochemist and geneticist of Jewish descent. He is from Kingstree, South Carolina. He was given the Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine (together with Michael S. Brown) for his research on the metabolism of LDL. ==Other websites== *Biography Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:American biochemists Category:American geneticists Category:American Nobel Prize winners Category:Jewish American scientists Category:Jewish Nobel Prize winners Category:Scientists from South Carolina Category:Academics from Texas
